twoSetSkill.name: Oath of Judah 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: For every Elite enemy on the battlefield, the host gains 8% Crit Rate. Stacks up to 4 times.

threeSetSkill.name: Eternal Saint 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: For every elite killed, Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) of the host gain 15% Physical DMG. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 120s (adding a stack does not refresh the duration).
